snippet: Shares in the China Minzhong Food Corporation, targeted last week by the California short-seller Glaucus Research Group, surged 112 percent after the company received a $576 million takeover offer from Indofood Sukses Makmur.
abstract: Shares in the China Minzhong Food Corporation, targeted last week by the California short-seller Glaucus Research Group, surged 112 percent after the company received a $576 million takeover offer from Indofood Sukses Makmur.

headline.main: Takeover Bid for Chinese Food Company Rebuffs Short-Seller Attack
